oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Weed problems in various tillage systems in the Nordic countries
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Tørresen, K.S.
Salonen, J.
Fogelfors, H.
Håkansson, S.
Melander, B.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Weed management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This presentation deals with commonly seen weed problems associated with various tillage systems in the Nordic countries illustrated by results from some case studies.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Tørresen, K.S.; Salonen, J.; Fogelfors, H.; Håkansson, S. and Melander, B. (2006) Weed problems in various tillage systems in the Nordic countries. In: Book of abstracts, Nordic Association of Agricultural Scientists, 2 (4), NJF Report, p. 16.
